sn19.9:4.1: “Just now, Reverend, as I was descending from Vulture’s Peak Mountain I saw a man whose body hairs were needles flying through the air.
sn19.9:4.2: The needles bored into his head and out his mouth,
sn19.9:4.3: into his mouth and out his chest,
sn19.9:4.4: into his chest and out his belly,
sn19.9:4.5: into his belly and out his thighs,
sn19.9:4.6: into his thighs and out his calves,
sn19.9:4.7: and into his calves and out his feet.
sn19.9:4.9: “That being used to be an informant right here in Rājagaha. …”
